description:
The trial run for Keroro`s latest invasion plan involves mixing up all the buttons and switches in the Hinata home, but when he tries to go "wide," the underground base`s buttons get messed up, too. Then, when everyone is mad at Keroro, he uses a device to erase their negative short-term memories, but finds the process addictive...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Invading Daily Life / Keroro, Hooray For Reset
ケロロ 日常を侵略せよ であります / ケロロ リセット万歳 であります
